cast.overview: Jerry Maguire used to be a typical sports agent: willing to do just about anything he could to get the biggest possible contracts for his clients, plus a nice commission for himself. Then, one day, he suddenly has second thoughts about what he's really doing. When he voices these doubts, he ends up losing his job and all of his clients, save Rod Tidwell, an egomaniacal football player.
cast.title: Jerry Maguire

details.biography:
Rebecca Rigg (born 31 December 1967) is an Australian actress. She is known for her roles in television and film. She started out as a child actor in Fatty Finn (1980), before also being featured in the films Hunting (1991), Spotswood (1992) and Ellie Parker (2005).

Rigg married Simon Baker in 1998 after five years together, and they have three children, including actress Stella Baker. They separated in 2020.
details.name: Rebecca Rigg
